title: Help
body: I cant seem to download the game on the android smart software any suggestions?

replies.body:
Are you trying to download the League Friends App? The game itself only runs on Windows and Mac OS, but the League Friends mobile app runs on Android. 

You can grab the app from [this link.](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.riotgames.mobile.leagueconnect&hl=en)

Let me know if you have any questions.
